title: Little: A Good Example is More Compelling than Good Advice
description:
A teaching story about Torah study from Wendy Mogel’s book “The Blessing of a Skinned Knee” is a terrific reminder that a good example is more compelling than good advice.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
